lyrics: Tum mama priya Bharat sam bhai
Kavi kovid kahi sake kahan te
Tum rakshak kahu ko dar naa
Man Kram Vachan dyan jo lavai
Tin ke kaj sakal Tum saja
Ashta Siddhi Nav Nidhi ke dhata
Hanumanth se hi sarve sukh karehi
Jo sat bar path kar koi

meanings.Jai Hanuman gyan gun sagar: Hail Hanuman, the ocean of knowledge and virtues
meanings.Jai Kapis tihun lok ujagar: Hail the monkey lord who illuminates the three worlds
meanings.Ram doot atulit bal dhama: Messenger of Ram and the abode of incomparable strength
meanings.Anjani-putra Pavan sut nama: Son of Anjani and known as the son of the wind god
meanings.Mahavir Vikram Bajrangi: Great hero and valiant as thunderbolt
meanings.Kumati nivar sumati Ke sangi: Remover of wickedness and companion of goodness
meanings.Hath Vajra Aur Dhuvaje Viraje: Holding a thunderbolt and a flag in his hands
meanings.Kandhe moonj janeu sajai: Wearing a sacred thread on his shoulder
meanings.Tej prataap maha jag vandan: Greatly respected for his radiance and prowess
meanings.Ram kaj karibe ko aatur: Always eager to perform the tasks of Ram
meanings.Prabhu charitra sunibe ko rasiya: Enthusiastically listens to the deeds of the Lord
meanings.Ram Lakhan Sita man basiya: Dwells in the hearts of Ram, Lakshman, and Sita
meanings.Sukshma roop dhari Siyahi dikhava: Appeared before Sita in a humble form
meanings.Vikat roop dhari lank jarava: Assumed a fearful form to burn Lanka
meanings.Bhima roop dhari asur sanghare: Took a gigantic form to destroy demons
meanings.Ramachandra ke kaj sanvare: Accomplished the tasks of Lord Ram
meanings.Shri Raghubir harashi ur laye: Shri Ram embraced him with joy
meanings.Tum mama priya Bharat sam bhai: You are as dear to me as my brother Bharat
meanings.Asa kahi Shripati kanth lagaave: So says Lord Ram, embracing you
meanings.Sankadik Brahmadi Muneesa: Sanaka and the sages like Brahma
meanings.Narad Sarad sahit Aheesa: Narada, Saraswati, and the lord of serpents
meanings.Yam Kuber Digpal Jahan te: Yama, Kubera, and the guardians of the directions
meanings.Kavi kovid kahi sake kahan te: Even poets and scholars are unable to describe your glory
meanings.Ram milaye rajpad deenha: You introduced him to Ram and made him king
meanings.Lankeshwar bhaye sab jag jana: And became the king of Lanka, known by all
meanings.Yug sahastra jojan par Bhanu: You swallowed the sun, thinking it a sweet fruit
meanings.Leelyo tahi madhur phal janu: Thinking it to be a sweet fruit
meanings.Prabhu mudrika meli mukh mahee: You carried Lord Ram's ring in your mouth
meanings.Jaladhi langhi gaye achraj nahee: Crossed the ocean with no difficulty
meanings.Durgaam kaj jagat ke jete: All difficult tasks in the world
meanings.Ram dware tum rakhware: You guard the doors of Ram
meanings.Hoat na agya binu paisare: No one can enter without your permission
meanings.Sab sukh lahain tumhari sarna: All happiness is attained by your shelter
meanings.Tum rakshak kahu ko dar naa: Under your protection, there is no fear
meanings.Aapan tej samharo aapai: You alone control your great power
meanings.Teenhon lok hank te kanpai: All three worlds tremble at your roar
meanings.Bhoot pishach Nikat nahin aavai: Ghosts and evil spirits do not come near
meanings.Mahavir jab naam sunavai: When they hear the name of the brave Mahavir
meanings.Japat nirantar Hanumant beera: By constant chanting of Hanuman's name
meanings.Man Kram Vachan dyan jo lavai: For those who meditate on him with mind, body, and words
meanings.Sab par Ram tapasvee raja: Ram, the ascetic king, is the protector of all
meanings.Tin ke kaj sakal Tum saja: All his tasks are accomplished by you
meanings.Aur manorath jo koi lavai: Anyone who comes to you with desires
meanings.Sohi amit jeevan phal pavai: Obtains the fruits of an immortal life
meanings.Charon Yug partap tumhara: Your glory is renowned in all four ages
meanings.Sadhu Sant ke tum Rakhware: Protector of the saints and sages
meanings.Asur nikandan Ram dulare: Destroyer of demons and beloved of Ram
meanings.Ashta Siddhi Nav Nidhi ke dhata: Bestower of the eight perfections and nine treasures
meanings.As var deen Janki mata: This boon was granted by Mother Janki
meanings.Ram rasayan tumhare pasa: You possess the essence of Ram
meanings.Sada raho Raghupati ke dasa: Always remain the servant of Ram
meanings.Tumhare bhajan Ram ko pavai: By singing your praises, one attains Ram
meanings.Janam janam ke dukh bisravai: And forgets the sorrows of many lifetimes
meanings.Anth kaal Raghuvir pur jayee: At the end of life, one goes to Ram's abode
meanings.Jahan janma Hari-Bakht kahai: And is born as a devotee of Hari
meanings.Aur Devta Chit na dharehi: No other deity resides in my heart
meanings.Hanumanth se hi sarve sukh karehi: All happiness comes from Hanuman alone
meanings.Jo sumirai Hanumant balbeera: For those who remember the brave Hanuman
meanings.Kripa Karahu Gurudev ki nyahin: Please bestow your grace as my guru
meanings.Jo sat bar path kar koi: Whoever recites this a hundred times
meanings.Chutehi bandhi maha sukh hoi: Is freed from bondage and gains great happiness
meanings.Jo yah padhe Hanuman Chalisa: Those who read the Hanuman Chalisa
meanings.Hoye siddhi sakhi Gaureesa: Attain success with the witness of Lord Shiva
meanings.Tulsidas sada hari chera: Tulsidas is always a servant of Hari
meanings.Keejai Nath Hridaye mein dera: O Lord, reside in my heart

lyrics: Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Deva
Mathe Par Tilak Sohe Muse Ki Sawari
Andan Ko Phool Chade Aur Dhoop Deep
Ladduan Ka Bhog Lage Sant Karein Seva
Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Deva
Denan Ki Laaj Rakho Shambhu Suta
Vighna Harata Mangal Karata Deva Ki Seva
Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Deva

meanings.Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Deva: Hail Ganesh, Hail Ganesh, Hail Ganesh, the deity
meanings.Mata Jaki Parvati Pita Mahadeva: Mother is Parvati, Father is Mahadeva
meanings.Mathe Par Tilak Sohe Muse Ki Sawari: Forehead adorned with a mark, riding a mouse
meanings.Andan Ko Phool Chade Aur Dhoop Deep: Offerings of flowers and incense are made
meanings.Ladduan Ka Bhog Lage Sant Karein Seva: Offerings of sweets are made, and saints serve
meanings.Denan Ki Laaj Rakho Shambhu Suta: Please uphold the honor of your devotees, O son of Shambhu
meanings.Vighna Harata Mangal Karata Deva Ki Seva: You remove obstacles and bring auspiciousness, serving the divine

lyrics: Do Bhuj Char Chaturbhuj Das Bhuj Te Sohai
Trigun Roop Nirakhta Tribhvan Jan Mohai

meanings.Brahma Vishnu Sadashiv: Embodiment of Brahma, Vishnu, and Shiva
meanings.Ardhangi Dhara: The one who has Parvati as half of his body
meanings.Ekanan Chaturanan Panchanan Rajai: With one face, four faces, and five faces
meanings.Hansasan Garudasan Vrishvahan Sajai: Mounted on a swan, Garuda, and a bull
meanings.Do Bhuj Char Chaturbhuj Das Bhuj Te Soha: With two arms, four arms, and ten arms
meanings.Trigun Roop Nirakhta Tribhvan Jan Mohai: The form of three qualities captivates the three worlds
meanings.Akshaymala Vanamala Mundmala Dhari: Wearing a garland of beads, flowers, and skulls
meanings.Trilochan Dashbhuj Dhari Trishuldamari: The three-eyed one, with ten arms, holding a trident
meanings.Uma Maheshwar Nandishwar Sahay: Uma's consort, the great lord, with Nandi

lyrics: Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri
Tumako Nishidin Dhyavat, Hari Bramha Shivaji
Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri
Mang Sindur Virajat, Tiko Mrigmad Ko
Ujjwal Se Dou Naina, Chandravadan Niko
Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri
Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri
Kehari Vahan Rajat, Khadag Khappar Dhari
Sur Nar Munijan Sevak, Tinke Dukh Hari
Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri
Kotik Chandra Divakar, Rajat Sam Jyoti
Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri
Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri
Chandh Mund Sanhare, Shonit Bij Hare
Madhu Kaitabh Dou Mare, Sur Bhay Nikare
Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri
Aagyaan Aan Paye, Tumhi Shiv Daani
Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri
Ridh Sidhi Parivaar, Sadgun Aur Chhaya
Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri
Sambhu Sanat Kumara, Rudra Jab Gaye
Surya Chandra Sam Vare, Tumko Nit Nave
Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri
Dhayaan Adhika Paayi, Dhayaan Mein Khoyi
Yah Sadhu Soorat Tumhe, Sada Shiv Boli
Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri
Sharan Mein Jo Aaye, Tumhi Ho Vichaar
Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri

meanings.Jai Ambe Gauri, Maiya Jai Shyama Gauri: Hail Ambe Gauri, Hail Shyama Gauri
meanings.Tumako Nishidin Dhyavat, Hari Bramha Shi: You are meditated upon day and night by Hari, Brahma, and Shiva
meanings.Mang Sindur Virajat, Tiko Mrigmad Ko: Your forehead is adorned with vermilion and sandalwood paste
meanings.Ujjwal Se Dou Naina, Chandravadan Niko: Your bright eyes and moon-like face are beautiful
meanings.Kanak Saman Kalevar, Raktambar Rajai: Your golden body is draped in a red robe
meanings.Raktpushp Galmala, Kanth Milak Sohai: A garland of red flowers adorns your neck
meanings.Kehari Vahan Rajat, Khadag Khappar Dhari: Riding a lion, holding a sword and skull
meanings.Sur Nar Munijan Sevak, Tinke Dukh Hari: Devas, humans, and sages serve you, and you remove their sorrows
meanings.Kaanan Kundal Shobhit, Nasagre Moti: Your earrings and nose ring shine brightly
meanings.Kotik Chandra Divakar, Rajat Sam Jyoti: Your brilliance is like millions of suns and moons
meanings.Shumbha Nishumbha Vidare, Mahishasur Gha: You tore apart Shumbha and Nishumbha, and slayed Mahishasura
meanings.Dhoomr Vilochan Naina, Nishidin Madmatti: With red eyes, you are intoxicated day and night
meanings.Chandh Mund Sanhare, Shonit Bij Hare: You destroyed Chand and Mund, and wiped out Shonit Bij
meanings.Madhu Kaitabh Dou Mare, Sur Bhay Nikare: You killed Madhu and Kaitabh, removing the fears of the gods
meanings.Brahmani Rudrani, Tum Kamala Rani: You are Brahmani, Rudrani, and the queen of Kamala
meanings.Aagyaan Aan Paye, Tumhi Shiv Daani: Only you are capable of bestowing the boon of immortality
meanings.Ridh Sidhi Parivaar, Sadgun Aur Chhaya: You are accompanied by Riddhi and Siddhi, and are the embodiment of virtue
meanings.Anahata Navmi Bhakti, Priya Kripaaya: You are dear to those who are devoted to you with unwavering faith
meanings.Sambhu Sanat Kumara, Rudra Jab Gaye: Shiva, Sanat Kumara, and Rudra sing your praises
meanings.Surya Chandra Sam Vare, Tumko Nit Nave: The sun and moon constantly bow to you
meanings.Dhayaan Adhika Paayi, Dhayaan Mein Khoyi: Your devotees lose themselves in your meditation
meanings.Yah Sadhu Soorat Tumhe, Sada Shiv Boli: Sages and saints always speak of your beauty
meanings.Dhayaantam Bhakti, Aasakti Apaar: Devotion to you brings unparalleled attachment
meanings.Sharan Mein Jo Aaye, Tumhi Ho Vichaar: You protect those who come to you for refuge
